DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the influence of Plasma Rich in Growth Factors (PRGF) on the healing process of medial collateral ligament (MCL) tear.
DOC.brief_title: Influence of Plasma Rich in Growth Factors (PRGF) on Healing of Medial Collateral Ligament (MCL) Tear
DOC.detailed_description: Autologous platelet-rich matrices may aid in the healing of ligaments & tendons by promoting and accelerating tissue healing because of the release of growth factors including transforming growth factor (TGF)-beta1 and platelet-derived growth factor (PDGF) from platelet alpha-granules.
DOC.criteria: age 1840 years old diagnosed MCL tear grade 2/3 pregnancy mental or physical disabilities
